content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":214032,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう、駄目だよぉ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, that's no good anymore.\""},{"lineNumber":214033,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お父さんが可哀想でしょ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You should feel sorry for Dad, right?\""},{"lineNumber":214034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　お父さん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? Dad?\""},{"lineNumber":214035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、こほんこほん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ahem, ahem!\""},{"lineNumber":214036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、ナギちゃん達が犯人ではないかもって、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I might be able to defend that Nagi and the others might not be the culprits,\""},{"lineNumber":214037,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し擁護できるかも知れないこととしては","translatedEnglishLine":"as a small thing that might be a bit of an excuse,"},{"lineNumber":214038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「盗品がどこにも見つからないんだよねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The stolen goods can't be found anywhere.\""},{"lineNumber":214039,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほほう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":214040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「宿屋内をくまなく探したけどどこにもないし、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We searched thoroughly inside the inn but they were nowhere to be found,"},{"lineNumber":214041,"originalJapaneseLine":"　市場にも流れてなくて、","translatedEnglishLine":"and they haven't appeared in the market either,"},{"lineNumber":214042,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこに行ったか分からないの」","translatedEnglishLine":"so we don't know where they went.\""},{"lineNumber":214043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みんなが今日はまだ一度も","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone hasn't even stepped outside the inn once today,"},{"lineNumber":214044,"originalJapaneseLine":"　宿の外に出てないのは宿の人も確認してるけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"the inn staff have also confirmed no one has left,"},{"lineNumber":214045,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうなると、盗品の行方が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and if that's so, then the whereabouts of the stolen goods...\""},{"lineNumber":214046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、よく分からんねえ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I really don't understand...\""},{"lineNumber":214047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「消えた盗品、ねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The vanished stolen goods, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":214048,"originalJapaneseLine":"事件当夜、アリバイのない人間は極端に少なかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"On the night of the incident, there were very few people without an alibi."},{"lineNumber":214049,"originalJapaneseLine":"手がかり『それぞれのアリバイ』を手に入れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Obtained clue: 'Each person's alibi'."},{"lineNumber":214050,"originalJapaneseLine":"盗まれた品はロッキーの部屋の一点以外は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Except for one item from Rocky's room, the stolen goods"},{"lineNumber":214051,"originalJapaneseLine":"宿屋内には見つからず、市場にも流れていない。","translatedEnglishLine":"were not found inside the inn, nor have they appeared in the market."},{"lineNumber":214052,"originalJapaneseLine":"手がかり『消えた盗品』を手に入れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Obtained clue: 'Vanished stolen goods'."},{"lineNumber":214053,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、次々ー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, next!\""},{"lineNumber":214054,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう、ここの調査はこんなものかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, I guess that's all for the investigation here?\""},{"lineNumber":214055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":214056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あのぉ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, um...\""},{"lineNumber":214057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、バイタルさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Vital-san.\""},{"lineNumber":214058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":214059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":214060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ううっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":214061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、なんでもありません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's nothing...\""},{"lineNumber":214062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　し、失礼しました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'm sorry to bother you.\""},{"lineNumber":214063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":214064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだぁ？　行っちゃった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What was that? They left.\""},{"lineNumber":214065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":214066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、いいや」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, whatever.\""},{"lineNumber":214067,"originalJapaneseLine":"盗まれたものは貴金属ばかりだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The stolen items were all precious metals."},{"lineNumber":214068,"originalJapaneseLine":"手がかり『盗品の情報』を手に入れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Obtained clue: 'Information on stolen goods'."},{"lineNumber":214069,"originalJapaneseLine":"事件当夜、最も高い客室は盗みに入られたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"On the night of the incident, the highest-tier guest room was broken into,"},{"lineNumber":214070,"originalJapaneseLine":"戸締まりは厳重にされていたらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"but the locking was reportedly very secure."},{"lineNumber":214071,"originalJapaneseLine":"手がかり『最高級ルームの施錠』を手に入れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Obtained clue: 'Locking of the deluxe room'."},{"lineNumber":214072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、終わり」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, that's it.\""},{"lineNumber":214073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？　終わり？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? That's it?\""},{"lineNumber":214074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、もう犯人は分かったよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, I already know who the culprit is.\""},{"lineNumber":214075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ！　マジで！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh! Really!?\""},{"lineNumber":214076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、まさか＜エール＞も……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, could it be <Aile> too...\""},{"lineNumber":214077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジすか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously!?\""},{"lineNumber":214078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やべえ、俺なんにも分かんねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn, I don't understand anything...\""},{"lineNumber":214079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really."},{"lineNumber":214080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、推理してるだけ偉いわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, you're great just for trying to figure it out.\""},{"lineNumber":214081,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺、こういうの死ぬほど苦手なんだよぉ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm really bad at this kind of thing, to death.\""},{"lineNumber":214082,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいんだ、いいんだ……友よ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's fine, it's fine... my friend..."},{"lineNumber":214083,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺もなーんも分かんねぇから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't understand anything either...\""},{"lineNumber":214084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃ、そろそろ解決編？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, it's about time for the solution part?\""},{"lineNumber":214085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへー、そう、なんだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, yes, but...\""},{"lineNumber":214086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっと別行動ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We'll have to split up a bit.\""},{"lineNumber":214087,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ？　なんでまた？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Why again?\""},{"lineNumber":214088,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここから先は犯人捜しの調査じゃないから」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From here on, it's no longer an investigation to find the culprit.\""},{"lineNumber":214089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごめんね、後で説明するからね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry, I'll explain later."},{"lineNumber":214090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　またねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"See you later!\""},{"lineNumber":214091,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、行っちゃった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, they've gone...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お父さんが可哀想でしょ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You should feel sorry for Dad, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、ナギちゃん達が犯人ではないかもって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I might be able to defend that Nagi and the others might not be the culprits,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し擁護できるかも知れないこととしては
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as a small thing that might be a bit of an excuse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「盗品がどこにも見つからないんだよねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The stolen goods can't be found anywhere."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宿屋内をくまなく探したけどどこにもないし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We searched thoroughly inside the inn but they were nowhere to be found,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 市場にも流れてなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they haven't appeared in the market either,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこに行ったか分からないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we don't know where they went."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんなが今日はまだ一度も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone hasn't even stepped outside the inn once today,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宿の外に出てないのは宿の人も確認してるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the inn staff have also confirmed no one has left,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうなると、盗品の行方が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and if that's so, then the whereabouts of the stolen goods..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 事件当夜、アリバイのない人間は極端に少なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the night of the incident, there were very few people without an alibi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手がかり『それぞれのアリバイ』を手に入れた。
盗まれた品はロッキーの部屋の一点以外は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Except for one item from Rocky's room, the stolen goods

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宿屋内には見つからず、市場にも流れていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were not found inside the inn, nor have they appeared in the market.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手がかり『消えた盗品』を手に入れた。
「ふう、ここの調査はこんなものかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew, I guess that's all for the investigation here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだぁ？　行っちゃった」
盗まれたものは貴金属ばかりだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The stolen items were all precious metals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手がかり『盗品の情報』を手に入れた。
事件当夜、最も高い客室は盗みに入られたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the night of the incident, the highest-tier guest room was broken into,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戸締まりは厳重にされていたらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the locking was reportedly very secure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手がかり『最高級ルームの施錠』を手に入れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Obtained clue: 'Locking of the deluxe room'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、もう犯人は分かったよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I already know who the culprit is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やべえ、俺なんにも分かんねぇ……」
いや、推理してるだけ偉いわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, you're great just for trying to figure it out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺、こういうの死ぬほど苦手なんだよぉ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm really bad at this kind of thing, to death."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺もなーんも分かんねぇから……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, it's about time for the solution part?"
"We'll have to split up a bit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここから先は犯人捜しの調査じゃないから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From here on, it's no longer an investigation to find the culprit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごめんね、後で説明するからね。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

いや、推理してるだけ偉いわ」
